channel.title: The words "Black Mesa" dont show when you start a new game
channel.description: So, I bought the game yesterday, and I love it, but the one problem i have had so far was, When I start the game, Its just a black screen with the cool music where its supposed to say "Black Mesa", instead, I hear the music with a black screen and then the game starts, Is this a bug? or was it taken out? :?: :?:

item.title: The words "Black Mesa" dont show when you start a new game
item.dc:creator: Mrturtleguy
item.description:
So, I bought the game yesterday, and I love it, but the one problem i have had so far was, When I start the game, Its just a black screen with the cool music where its supposed to say “Black Mesa”, instead, I hear the music with a black screen and then the game starts, Is this a bug? or was it taken out? :?: :?:

Read full topic
item.source: The words "Black Mesa" dont show when you start a new game
